dcterms:creator: Michael Roth
Talita Anthonio
Anna Sauer
dcterms:description: A dataset for evaluating NLP systems in distinguishing plausible clarifications of implicit and underspecified phrases in instructional texts. It includes articles from WikiHow with contexts and possible filler options labeled as plausible, neutral, or implausible.
dcterms:title: SemEval-2022 Task 7
